name: Node MySQL Login
description1: An express webserver that uses a MySQL server to manage user logins, to facilitate access to restricted pages that are customised for logged-in users.
description2: An Express router was setup to handle the rendering of pages with another router setup to handle user authentication. The two systems are combined to allow us to have pages that are viewable only by logged in users, allowing us to present information tailored to that user.

name: Chat App
description1: Simple chat app created using nodejs and socket.io. Users can join virtual chatrooms and chat with other people who have joined a room of the same name.
